stats.name: gamesPlayed
stats.description: Games Played

stats.name: teamGamesPlayed
stats.description: The number of games played by a team.

stats.name: hitByPitch
stats.description: The number of times a player has been by a pitch.

stats.name: groundBalls
stats.description: The number of ground outs made by a player or team.

stats.name: strikeouts
stats.description: The number of times a player strikes out.

stats.name: RBIs
stats.description: The number of runs scored by a batter's play.

stats.name: sacHits
stats.description: The number of sacrifice bunts that allow baserunners to advance

stats.name: hits
stats.description: The number of hits.

stats.name: stolenBases
stats.description: The number of bases stolen.

stats.name: walks
stats.description: The number of times a batter reaches base on four balls

stats.name: catcherInterference
stats.description: Catcher Interference

stats.name: runs
stats.description: The number of runs scored.

stats.name: GIDPs
stats.description: The number of times a batter grounds into a double play.

stats.name: sacFlies
stats.description: The number of times a batter advances a runner with a fly out.

stats.name: atBats
stats.description: The number of times a batter comes up to bat not counting walks and sacrifices.

stats.name: homeRuns
stats.description: The number of hits that allowed the batter to round the bases and score without the aid of an error of the defense.

stats.name: grandSlamHomeRuns
stats.description: The number of hits that allowed the batter and 3 of his teammates to round the bases and score without the aid of an error of the defense.

stats.name: runnersLeftOnBase
stats.description: The number runners remain on base after the batter makes an out at the plate.

stats.name: triples
stats.description: The number of hits that result in the batter reaching 3rd base without the aid of an error.

stats.name: gameWinningRBIs
stats.description: The number of times a batter has a RBI that results in the batter's team winning the game.

stats.name: intentionalWalks
stats.description: The number of times that a batter is walked by four intentionally thrown balls by the pitcher.

stats.name: doubles
stats.description: The number of times that a batter reaches second base as the result of a hit without an error being committed.

stats.name: flyBalls
stats.description: The number of time a batter flies out.

stats.name: caughtStealing
stats.description: The number of times that a baserunner attempts to steal a base but is thrown out.

stats.name: pitches
stats.description: The number of pitches faced.

stats.name: gamesStarted
stats.description: The number of games that a batter starts.

stats.name: pinchAtBats
stats.description: The number of times a batter has come in off the bench to pinch hit for another batter.

stats.name: pinchHits
stats.description: The number of times a batter has in off the bench to pinch hit for another batter and gotten a hit.

stats.name: playerRating
stats.description: Player Rating

stats.name: isQualified
stats.description: Whether a batter is qualified in terms of at bats

stats.name: isQualifiedSteals
stats.description: Whether a player is qualified in number of stolen base attempts.

stats.name: totalBases
stats.description: The number of bases calculated as 1 for a 1B, 2 for a 2B, 3 for a 3B and 4 for a HR.

stats.name: plateAppearances
stats.description: The number of times a batter comes up to bat.

stats.name: projectedHomeRuns
stats.description: The number of home runs is expected to accumulate.

stats.name: extraBaseHits
stats.description: The number of hits that are greater than singles.

stats.name: runsCreated
stats.description: The estimate of how many runs a player has created.

stats.name: avg
stats.description: The average number of times the batter reached successfully on base due to a hit: hits / atBats

stats.name: pinchAvg
stats.description: The batting when a batter pinch hits.

stats.name: slugAvg
stats.description: Slugging percentage is a metric that is meant to measuring how many bases the hitter safely advances to after making contact with the ball: (totalBases / atBats)

stats.name: secondaryAvg
stats.description: The average of extra bases gained via hits, walks and stolen bases versus at bats.

stats.name: onBasePct
stats.description: The ratio of the number of times the batter reached base per plate appearnce: (hits + walks + hbp / plateAppearances)

stats.name: OPS
stats.description: The average calculated by adding up on-base percentage and slugging percentage.

stats.name: groundToFlyRatio
stats.description: The ratio of ground outs to fly outs.

stats.name: runsCreatedPer27Outs
stats.description: The estimated number of runs created per 27 outs played.

stats.name: batterRating
stats.description: Batter Rating

stats.name: atBatsPerHomeRun
stats.description: The ratio of at bats per home run hit.

stats.name: stolenBasePct
stats.description: The percentage of stolen bases successfully stolen by a baserunner.

stats.name: pitchesPerPlateAppearance
stats.description: The average number of pitches a batter sees per plate appearance.

stats.name: isolatedPower
stats.description: The measure of a batter's ability to hit for extra bases, calculated by subtracting batting average from slugging percentage.

stats.name: walkToStrikeoutRatio
stats.description: The number of walks to the number of strikeouts by a batter.

stats.name: walksPerPlateAppearance
stats.description: The ratio of walks to plate appearances for a batter.

stats.name: secondaryAvgMinusBA
stats.description: The metric calculated by subtracting batitng average from secondary average.

stats.name: runsProduced
stats.description: The estimation of how many runs a batter has contributed.

stats.name: runsRatio
stats.description: The ratio of runs scored to plate appearances by a batter.

stats.name: patienceRatio
stats.description: The metric that attempts to measure a batter's patience.

stats.name: BIPA
stats.description: The average of a batter when the ball is put in play or batting average without factoring at bats that result in a home run or a strikeout.

stats.name: MLBRating
stats.description: The MLB rating.

stats.name: offWARBR
stats.description: Offensive Wins Above Replacement.

stats.name: WARBR
stats.description: Wins Above Replacement.

stats.name: gamesPlayed
stats.description: Games Played

stats.name: teamGamesPlayed
stats.description: The number of games played by a team.

stats.name: saves
stats.description: The number of times a pitcher enters and finishes the game without surrendering the lead in a save opportunity.

stats.name: groundBalls
stats.description: The number of ground balls hit against a pitcher.

stats.name: strikeouts
stats.description: The number of times the pitcher struck out a batter.

stats.name: sacFlies
stats.description: The number of sacrifice flies surrendered.

stats.name: losses
stats.description: The number of losses for a pitcher.

stats.name: hits
stats.description: The number of hits surrendered by a pitcher.

stats.name: earnedRuns
stats.description: The number of earned runs surrendered by a pitcher.

stats.name: battersHit
stats.description: The number of batters hit by a pitcher.

stats.name: walks
stats.description: The number of times a pitcher surrenders a base on balls.

stats.name: runs
stats.description: The number of runs allowed by a pitcher.

stats.name: stolenBases
stats.description: The number of times a pitcher allows a baserunner to steal a base.

stats.name: caughtStealing
stats.description: The number of times a pitcher gets out a baserunner trying to steal a base.

stats.name: sacBunts
stats.description: The number of times a sacrifce bunt is allowed by a pitcher.

stats.name: saveOpportunities
stats.description: The number of times a pitcher enters the game with a lead of fewer than 4 runs and pitches at least one inning; enters the game with the potentional tying run on base, at bat, or on deck; or pitches three or more innings with a lead

stats.name: homeRuns
stats.description: The number of times a pitcher has allowed a home run.

stats.name: triples
stats.description: The number of triples surrendered by the picher

stats.name: finishes
stats.description: The number of times that a pitcher finishes the game.

stats.name: balks
stats.description: The number of times that a pitcher balks.

stats.name: intentionalWalks
stats.description: The number of times that a pitcher has intentionally walked a batter.

stats.name: flyBalls
stats.description: The number of fly balls a pitcher has produced.

stats.name: battersFaced
stats.description: The number of batters faced by a pitcher.

stats.name: holds
stats.description: The number of times a pitcher enters the game with the lead, gets at least an out and leaves the game wihtout having given up the lead.

stats.name: doubles
stats.description: The number of doubles allowed by a pitcher.

stats.name: wins
stats.description: The number of times the pitcher was attributed with a win

stats.name: completeGames
stats.description: The number of times that pitcher starts and finishes a game.

stats.name: perfectGames
stats.description: The number of times the pitcher pitches a complete games shutout victory that lasts a minimum of nine innings in which no opposing player reaches base for any reason.

stats.name: wildPitches
stats.description: The number of times that a pitcher pitches a wild pitch.

stats.name: RBIs
stats.description: The number of runs scored due to the actions of the batter.

stats.name: thirdInnings
stats.description: The number of third innings pitched.

stats.name: teamEarnedRuns
stats.description: The number of earned runs allowed.

stats.name: shutouts
stats.description: The number of times that a pitcher allows zero runs.

stats.name: pickoffAttempts
stats.description: The number of times that a pitcher throws over to try and pickoff a baserunner.

stats.name: pitches
stats.description: The number of pitches a pitcher throws.

stats.name: runSupport
stats.description: The average number of runs scored while the pitcher is pitching.

stats.name: catcherInterference
stats.description: The number of times there is catcher interference.

stats.name: pitchesAsStarter
stats.description: The number of pitches thrown by a pitcher when they start a game.

stats.name: gamesStarted
stats.description: The number of games started by a pitcher.

stats.name: avgGameScore
stats.description: The average game score for a pitcher.

stats.name: qualityStarts
stats.description: The number of quality starts for a pitcher.

stats.name: inheritedRunners
stats.description: The number of baserunners when a relief pitcher enters the game.

stats.name: inheritedRunnersScored
stats.description: The number of inherited runners who scored.

stats.name: playerRating
stats.description: The rating of a pitcher.

stats.name: atBats
stats.description: The number of at bats.

stats.name: opponentTotalBases
stats.description: The number of bases allowed by the pitcher.

stats.name: isQualified
stats.description: Whether a player is qualified as a pitcher.

stats.name: isQualifiedSaves
stats.description: Whether a player is qualified for saves.

stats.name: fullInnings
stats.description: The number of full innings pitched by a pitcher.

stats.name: partInnings
stats.description: The number of times a pitcher pitches a part of an inning

stats.name: blownSaves
stats.description: The number of times a pitchers has a save opportunity and surrenders the lead.

stats.name: innings
stats.description: The number of innings pitched.

stats.name: ERA
stats.description: The average number of runs a pitcher yields per 9 innings thrown

stats.name: WHIP
stats.displayName: Walks Plus Hits Per Inning Pitched
stats.description: The number representing walks plus hits divided by innings pitched.

stats.name: winPct
stats.description: The percentage of wins for a pitcher.

stats.name: caughtStealingPct
stats.description: The percentage of baserunners caught stealing.

stats.name: groundToFlyRatio
stats.description: The number of ground balls to fly balls.

stats.name: pitchesPerStart
stats.description: The average number of pitches per game started by a pitcher.

stats.name: pitchesPerInning
stats.description: The average number of pitches per inning.

stats.name: pitchesPerPlateAppearance
stats.description: The average number of pitches per plate appearance for a pitcher.

stats.name: runSupportAvg
stats.description: The average run support a pitcher receives per game.

stats.name: opponentAvg
stats.description: The opponent's batting average for a pitcher.

stats.name: opponentSlugAvg
stats.description: The opponent's slugging percentage for a pitcher.

stats.name: opponentOnBasePct
stats.description: THe opponent's on base percentage for a pitcher.

stats.name: opponentOPS
stats.description: The opponent's on base percentage plus slugging percentage for a pitcher.

stats.name: savePct
stats.description: The percentage of save opportunities that are saved.

stats.name: strikeoutsPerNineInnings
stats.description: The average number of strikeouts for a pitcher per 9 innings.

stats.name: strikeoutToWalkRatio
stats.description: The ratio of strikeouts to walks by a pitcher.

stats.name: toughLosses
stats.description: The number of losses in games that are quality starts by the pitcher.

stats.name: cheapWins
stats.description: The number of wins that are not quality starts by the pitcher.

stats.name: saveOpportunitiesPerWin
stats.description: The number of save opportunities per win.

stats.name: BIPA
stats.description: The batter's batting average when facing the pitcher without taking into account home runs or strikeouts.

stats.name: pitchCount
stats.description: The number of pitches thrown.

stats.name: strikes
stats.description: The number of strikes thrown.

stats.name: strikePitchRatio
stats.description: The ratio of strikes thrown to pitches thrown.

stats.name: WARBR
stats.description: Wins Above Replacement.

stats.name: gamesPlayed
stats.description: Games Played

stats.name: teamGamesPlayed
stats.description: The number of games played by a team.

stats.name: doublePlays
stats.description: The number of double plays a fielder has been a part of as either the assister or putouter.

stats.name: opportunities
stats.description: The number of opportunites

stats.name: errors
stats.description: The number of times a fielder fails to make the play they are expected to make.

stats.name: passedBalls
stats.description: The number of times the ball is dropped or passes by the catcher.

stats.name: assists
stats.description: The number of times a fielder is involved in an out when the fielder is not the putouter.

stats.name: outfieldAssists
stats.description: The number of times an outfielder fielder is involved in an out when the fielder is not the putouter.

stats.name: pickoffs
stats.description: The number of times that a pitcher or catcher throws over and picks off a baserunner.

stats.name: putouts
stats.description: The number of times the fielder tags or forces the out of a baserunner.

stats.name: outsOnField
stats.description: The number of outs on field.

stats.name: triplePlays
stats.description: The number of times that a fielder is involved in a triple play.

stats.name: ballsInZone
stats.description: The number of balls that were batted into a fielder's zone.

stats.name: extraBases
stats.description: The number of extra base hits allowed.

stats.name: outsMade
stats.description: The number of outs made by a fielder.

stats.name: hits
stats.description: The number of hits surrendered.

stats.name: totalBases
stats.description: The number of bases allowed.

stats.name: gamesStarted
stats.description: The number of games started by a fielder.

stats.name: catcherThirdInningsPlayed
stats.description: The number of third innings played by a catcher.

stats.name: catcherCaughtStealing
stats.description: The number of times a catcher throws a baserunner trying to steal a base.

stats.name: catcherStolenBasesAllowed
stats.description: The number of stolen bases that a catcher allows.

stats.name: catcherEarnedRuns
stats.description: The number of runs allowed by the catcher that aren't the result of an error or passed ball.

stats.name: isQualified
stats.description: Whether a player is qualified as a fielder.

stats.name: isQualifiedCatcher
stats.description: Whether a player qualifies a catcher.

stats.name: isQualifiedPitcher
stats.description: Whether a player qualifies as a pitcher.

stats.name: successfulChances
stats.description: The number of outs involved in calculated by assists plus putouts.

stats.name: totalChances
stats.description: The number of chances a fielder has to make an out calculated by assists plus putouts plus errors.

stats.name: fullInningsPlayed
stats.description: The number of fully completed innings by a fielder.

stats.name: partInningsPlayed
stats.description: The number of at least partial innings played by a fielder.

stats.name: fieldingPct
stats.description: The percentage of plays made by a fielder given the total number of chances.

stats.name: rangeFactor
stats.description: The estimation of how much field a fielder can cover.

stats.name: zoneRating
stats.description: The metric used to estimate the ability of a fielder to defend a zone on the field.

stats.name: catcherCaughtStealingPct
stats.description: The percentage of baserunners caught by the catcher given the total number of steal attempts.

stats.name: catcherERA
stats.description: The number of earned runs multipled by 9 divided by the number of innings caught.

stats.name: defWARBR
stats.description: Defensive Wins Above Replacement.

stats.name: homeruns
stats.displayValue: Yelich (26, 4th inning off Boyd 0 on, 0 Out)

stats.name: teamRISP
stats.displayName: Team Runners Left In Scoring Position
stats.displayValue: 3-10 (Yelich 0-1, Contreras 0-1, Turang 1-2, Ortiz 0-2, Collins 0-1, Frelick 2-2, Durbin 0-1)

stats.name: runnersLeftScoringPosition2Outs
stats.displayName: Runners Left In Scoring Position With 2 Outs

stats.name: strikeRatio
stats.displayName: Called strikes-Swinging strikes-Foul balls-In play strikes

stats.description: The number of ground balls to fly balls.

stats.name: pitchesPerStart
stats.description: The average number of pitches per game started by a pitcher.

stats.name: pitchesPerInning
stats.description: The average number of pitches per inning.

stats.name: pitchesPerPlateAppearance
stats.description: The average number of pitches per plate appearance for a pitcher.

stats.name: runSupportAvg
stats.description: The average run support a pitcher receives per game.

stats.name: opponentAvg
stats.description: The opponent's batting average for a pitcher.

stats.name: opponentSlugAvg
stats.description: The opponent's slugging percentage for a pitcher.

stats.name: opponentOnBasePct
stats.description: THe opponent's on base percentage for a pitcher.

stats.name: opponentOPS
stats.description: The opponent's on base percentage plus slugging percentage for a pitcher.

stats.name: savePct
stats.description: The percentage of save opportunities that are saved.

stats.name: strikeoutsPerNineInnings
stats.description: The average number of strikeouts for a pitcher per 9 innings.

stats.name: strikeoutToWalkRatio
stats.description: The ratio of strikeouts to walks by a pitcher.

stats.name: toughLosses
stats.description: The number of losses in games that are quality starts by the pitcher.

stats.name: cheapWins
stats.description: The number of wins that are not quality starts by the pitcher.

stats.name: saveOpportunitiesPerWin
stats.description: The number of save opportunities per win.

stats.name: BIPA
stats.description: The batter's batting average when facing the pitcher without taking into account home runs or strikeouts.

stats.name: pitchCount
stats.description: The number of pitches thrown.

stats.name: strikes
stats.description: The number of strikes thrown.

stats.name: strikePitchRatio
stats.description: The ratio of strikes thrown to pitches thrown.

stats.name: WARBR
stats.description: Wins Above Replacement.

stats.name: gamesPlayed
stats.description: Games Played

stats.name: teamGamesPlayed
stats.description: The number of games played by a team.

stats.name: doublePlays
stats.description: The number of double plays a fielder has been a part of as either the assister or putouter.

stats.name: opportunities
stats.description: The number of opportunites

stats.name: errors
stats.description: The number of times a fielder fails to make the play they are expected to make.

stats.name: passedBalls
stats.description: The number of times the ball is dropped or passes by the catcher.

stats.name: assists
stats.description: The number of times a fielder is involved in an out when the fielder is not the putouter.

stats.name: outfieldAssists
stats.description: The number of times an outfielder fielder is involved in an out when the fielder is not the putouter.

stats.name: pickoffs
stats.description: The number of times that a pitcher or catcher throws over and picks off a baserunner.

stats.name: putouts
stats.description: The number of times the fielder tags or forces the out of a baserunner.

stats.name: outsOnField
stats.description: The number of outs on field.

stats.name: triplePlays
stats.description: The number of times that a fielder is involved in a triple play.

stats.name: ballsInZone
stats.description: The number of balls that were batted into a fielder's zone.

stats.name: extraBases
stats.description: The number of extra base hits allowed.

stats.name: outsMade
stats.description: The number of outs made by a fielder.

stats.name: hits
stats.description: The number of hits surrendered.

stats.name: totalBases
stats.description: The number of bases allowed.

stats.name: gamesStarted
stats.description: The number of games started by a fielder.

stats.name: catcherThirdInningsPlayed
stats.description: The number of third innings played by a catcher.

stats.name: catcherCaughtStealing
stats.description: The number of times a catcher throws a baserunner trying to steal a base.

stats.name: catcherStolenBasesAllowed
stats.description: The number of stolen bases that a catcher allows.

stats.name: catcherEarnedRuns
stats.description: The number of runs allowed by the catcher that aren't the result of an error or passed ball.

stats.name: isQualified
stats.description: Whether a player is qualified as a fielder.

stats.name: isQualifiedCatcher
stats.description: Whether a player qualifies a catcher.

stats.name: isQualifiedPitcher
stats.description: Whether a player qualifies as a pitcher.

stats.name: successfulChances
stats.description: The number of outs involved in calculated by assists plus putouts.

stats.name: totalChances
stats.description: The number of chances a fielder has to make an out calculated by assists plus putouts plus errors.

stats.name: fullInningsPlayed
stats.description: The number of fully completed innings by a fielder.

stats.name: partInningsPlayed
stats.description: The number of at least partial innings played by a fielder.

stats.name: fieldingPct
stats.description: The percentage of plays made by a fielder given the total number of chances.

stats.name: rangeFactor
stats.description: The estimation of how much field a fielder can cover.

stats.name: zoneRating
stats.description: The metric used to estimate the ability of a fielder to defend a zone on the field.

stats.name: catcherCaughtStealingPct
stats.description: The percentage of baserunners caught by the catcher given the total number of steal attempts.

stats.name: catcherERA
stats.description: The number of earned runs multipled by 9 divided by the number of innings caught.

stats.name: defWARBR
stats.description: Defensive Wins Above Replacement.

stats.name: homeruns
stats.displayValue: Castro (11, 3rd inning off Patrick 2 on, 1 Out); Caissie (1, 6th inning off Miller 0 on, 1 Out)

stats.name: teamRISP
stats.displayName: Team Runners Left In Scoring Position

stats.name: runnersLeftScoringPosition2Outs
stats.displayName: Runners Left In Scoring Position With 2 Outs

stats.name: pitcherNotes
stats.displayValue: Keller pitched to 1 batter in the 7th.

stats.name: strikeRatio
stats.displayName: Called strikes-Swinging strikes-Foul balls-In play strikes

stats.name: caughtStealing
stats.displayValue: Crow-Armstrong (7, 2nd base by Myers/Contreras); Shaw (3, 2nd base by Patrick/Contreras)

b-struck out looking for Ortiz in the 9th

article.headline: Caissie homers as the Cubs hold off the Brewers for a 6-4 win in doubleheader opener
article.description: Owen Caissie homered and drove in three runs, and the Chicago Cubs held off the Milwaukee Brewers for a 6-4 win in the opener of a split doubleheader on Tuesday.
article.linkText: Caissie homers as the Cubs hold off the Brewers for a 6-4 win in doubleheader opener

images.name: Cubs take Game 1 of DH vs. Brewers
images.caption: Owen Caissie drives in three runs in the Cubs' 6-4 win over the Brewers.

article.story: CHICAGO -- Owen Caissie homered and drove in three runs, and the Chicago Cubs held off the Milwaukee Brewers for a 6-4 win in the opener of a split doubleheader on Tuesday. Willi Castro also went deep as Chicago won for the third time in four games. Four Cubs relievers combined for 3 2/3 innings of two-hit ball after Matthew Boyd (12-6) departed in the sixth. Chicago (71-54) pulled within eight games of NL Central-leading Milwaukee (79-46). The teams were originally scheduled for a doubleheader on Monday, but the second game was postponed by rain. Christian Yelich homered for Milwaukee, and Sal Frelick had two hits and two RBI. It was just the third loss for the Brewers in their last 21 games. Chicago built a 5-0 lead on Caissie's two-run single in the first and Castro's three-run shot off Chad Patrick (3-8) in the third. It was Castros first homer since he was acquired in a July 31 trade with Minnesota. But Milwaukee quickly started chipping away at the deficit. Yelich opened the fourth with his 26th homer, and Frelick singled home Brandon Lockridge in the fifth. Frelick added another RBI single in a two-run sixth. Caissie then gave the Cubs a boost with his first major league homer, a 381-foot drive to left-center off Shelby Miller that made it 6-4 in the bottom half of the sixth. The 23-year-old Caissie singled in the seventh inning of Monday's 7-0 loss in the series opener for his first big league hit. Caleb Thielbar and Drew Pomeranz each pitched an inning for Chicago before Daniel Palencia handled the ninth for his 17th save in 19 chances. Key moment The Brewers had runners on second and third with two out in the sixth when Brad Keller struck out Caleb Durbin swinging, preserving the Cubs' 5-4 lead. Key stat The Cubs improved to 5-5 in the season series against the Brewers. Up next Brandon Woodruff (4-0, 2.06 ERA) starts for Milwaukee in the second game, and fellow right-hander Jameson Taillon (7-6, 4.44) pitches for Chicago. ------ AP MLB: https://apnews.com/hub/mlb
